eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Illinois; AT 09:15 AM ON NOV 04, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:15 PM NOV 08, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the required Monthly Test of the Emergency Alert System originated by the Illinois Emergency Management Agency IEMA. Rebroadcast within 1 hour.
